title: The Game Title
subtitle: A global pandemic has arrived in your backyard

landing.explanation1: We're in the first few days of a new viral spread. This virus can be transmitted before symptoms appear, and it has the potential to spread throughout the entire community—unless you take action now through physical distancing. The next 8 weeks are crucial for saving thousands of lives.
landing.explanation2: But you can’t do this alone! It’ll take the cooperation of the entire community to slow the spread of this disease. Together, you’ll have to find ways to meet your individual needs while limiting your outings as much as possible.
landing.explanation3: You’ll play alongside 20 other real people
landing.explanation4: These 19 other people have played before you. Their decisions and yours will determine how frequently people in your community leave their homes over the next 8 weeks. Each of these players represents 5% of the total population.
landing.explanation5: Your collective decisions will determine how many lives are lost or saved.
landing.instruction1: To start, enter your zip code or choose a community size.
landing.instruction2: We’ll pull real data to set up the game with your community’s actual population, density, and number of available hospital beds.

errors.zipNotFound: ZIP code not found, please try a different one

decide.h1: You've been fighting the virus for one week | You've been fighting the virus for {count} weeks
decide.h2Question: How many times will you go out this week?

heading.food: Oh no! You ran out of food
heading.exercise: Oh no! You forgot to exercise

failed.body: While we need to take care of our communities, we also need to stay fed and healthy ourselves. You cannot pour from an empty cup.

share.heading: Share this game and tell others to #stayhome
